name: BEAUTIFUL ISOLATION T-SHIRT [MENS LARGE]
description: Kingbastard - Beautiful Isolation T-Shirt. [Mens Large only] Designed by the Bastard himself, with artwork taken from the Beautiful Isolation CD. 100% Cotton, pre-shrunk. Design will not fade or be affected by washing. Please ensure you do not directly iron on the designs, preferably iron inside-out. Only 1 remaining. Design on back is the coded floppy disk artwork taken from the inner-CD Booklet and can be seen by following this link... KINGBASTARD - BEAUTIFUL ISOLATION T-SHIRT [BACK DESIGN] P&P to UK is free, Everywhere Else £2.50

name: Beautiful Isolation CD [Limited Edition]
description: RELEASED MAY 1ST 2010 on HERB RECORDINGS www.herbrecordings.com CLICK HERE FOR PRESS RELEASE Every Beautiful Isolation CD [Limited Edition] is lovingly hand-crafted & includes a Picture Disc, a 12-Page CD Booklet + a Mini CD containing 7 bonus tracks, all wrapped up with *Free Post & Packing. (*UK Only, Postage to EU is £1 and postage to Everywhere else £2) Download the album here: kingbastardmusic.com Click here for the Tracklisting

name: Tied Up To Machines CD
description: KINGBASTARD 'TIED UP TO MACHINES' Mini Album Release Date - 27th April 2009 (Alternative/Electronic) RELEASED BY HERB RECORDINGS. www.herbrecordings.com "The EP belts round a vast melting-pot of electronic wizardry in seven superb tracks, each as fascinating as the last..." "...what makes him stand out from the IT crowd? An abundance of melody and charm, since you ask. Chris has a knack for producing fascinating, complex melodies, the likes of which I simply haven't heard for way too long. This is electronic music rich with emotion and intelligence. (Tristan Parker Clash Magazine)(www.clashmusic.com/kingbastard) Out Now @ all good digital download stores. Tracklisting: 1. BOOMBOX 2. F47G4M3R 3. THE CAPTCHA 4. 4M813N7RK 5. THE SECRET LIFE OF MACHINES 6. 1M4GTRGUY 7. SAY WHEN (+bonus)

name: Bastardize CD
description:
Kingbastard LP Bastardize. 
(released 2008)

"Lively and full-blooded 21st century IDM ...... the beats are modern and harsh enough to hold the attention of even non-genre fans, and His Royal Bastardness is as adept a tunesmith as he is a producer......" Boomkat

name: The Don't Knows CD
description: Alternative/Acoustic/Introspective songs by Weeksy aka Kingbastard. 'Weeksy' Myspace Weeksy & The Don't Knows LP:- 'The Don't Knows' is an album of simply recorded, honest, heart-felt, indie/acoustic/alternative songs. Sometimes playful, sometimes dark, always emotive, Weeksy's creative introspection grabs your attention and your heart-strings and transports you into the mind of one of society's 'Don't Knows' Tracklisting: 1. Don't 2. Day by Day 3. Corridors 4. I ain't got time for IT 5. You do the Maths 6. Matuit 7. Fuckup 8. Distill 9. Myheadisaballoon 10. Hey 11. I am a Tree 12. Not Another Love Song 13. Jigsaw 14. See-Through Smile 15. Flesh & Bone 16. Vicious Circle 17. Sleep Tight 18. Getourest 19. Little Boy 20. P P P & P 21. Lovesick Ambulance
